attributes.action: ignore the various petitions for re-opening airfields for civil flying and instead use these airfields for housing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These old airfields should not be used for civil flying. All aircraft, especially small buzzy ones, constitute a civil nuisance. Instead the old airfields would make ideal sites for the low cost and social housing this country desperately needs, particularly in the south of England.
